definitions.definition: a large, tall machine used for moving heavy objects, typically by suspending them from a projecting arm or beam.
examples: derrick, winch, hoist, davit, windlass; block and tackle the cargo is lifted by a crane

definitions.definition: a moving platform supporting a television or movie camera.
stretch out one's body or neck in order to see something.
examples: she craned forward to look more clearly

definitions.definition: stretch out (one's neck) so as to see something.
examples: craning their necks to get a glimpse of the president

definitions.definition: move (a heavy object) with a crane.
examples: the wheelhouse module is craned into position on the hull

definitions.definition: a tall, long-legged, long-necked bird, typically with white or gray plumage and often with tail plumes and patches of bare red skin on the head. Cranes are noted for their elaborate courtship dances.
